thread.title: Jennifer Dawson

author: Jennifer Dawson
title: Jennifer Dawson
text: I required paddles for my baumatic washing machine. I goggled and eSpares had the correct paddle. I ordered two paddles and expected them to be with me in around a week. They arrived within a few days. They were extremely securely wrapped and well packaged. I have placed their card In a prominent place as and when I may require spares for any other equipment.
